00009 char *get_file_directory(char *file_path) {
00010         int i = 0;
00011 
00012         for(i = strlen(file_path); i > 0; i--) {
00013                 if(file_path[i] == '/') { 
00014                         file_path[i + 1] = '\0';
00015                         break;
00016                 }
00017         }
00018 
00019         return file_path;
00020 } /* get_file_directory */
00021 
00022 int num_digits(unsigned int num) {
00023         int count = 0;
00024 
00025         DEBUG("Counting number of digits in %u", num);
00026 
00027         do {
00028                 num /= 10;
00029                 count++;
00030         } while(num != 0);
00031 
00032         DEBUG("Number of digits: %d", count);
00033         return count;
00034 } /* num_digits */

00244 //      char **tags_checked = NULL;

00253 //      num_tokens = path_to_array(path, &tag_array);
00254 //      DEBUG(D_FUNCTION_UNIQUE_TAGS_IN_PATH, D_LEVEL_DEBUG, "Number of tokens: %d", num_tokens);

00257 //

00259 //              assert(tag_array != NULL);
00260 //              if(array_contains_string(tags_checked, tag_array[i], i)) {
00261 //                      unique = false;

00265 //              tags_checked[i] = malloc(strlen(tag_array[i]) + 1);

00274 //      DEBUG(D_FUNCTION_UNIQUE_TAGS_IN_PATH, D_LEVEL_EXIT, "unique_tags_in_path");
